lines.text: Without Goliath, David is just some punk throwing rocks.
I discovered you. You weren't even thinking about acting when I found you. You were delivering my newspapers. I got you this movie. I named you!
Shmell! Justin Shmell. I think they named a town here after you.
Does anyone here speak English? Perfect! Either I'm in heaven or the Miami airport.
[waking up after a car accident and seeing a cross]
Either God is in the salvage business or Bigfoot took my car!
I don't like heights. This is why I stopped growing at fifth grade.
That's my job. I find people to be in movies.
They pay for this? That's so stupid!
You've been talking to my father, haven't you!
